claims.object: System grounding of industrial and commercial power systems
Guarantee the safety of the electrical network
Guarantee the dependability of the electrical network
Guarantee the performance of the electrical network

surface_layer.definition: System grounding is crucial for the safety, dependability, and performance of electrical networks.

deep_layer.mechanism: Efficient grounding provides a low-resistance path for electrical current, preventing dangerous voltage buildup and protecting equipment and personnel.
deep_layer.origin: Emerged with the development of electrical power systems to mitigate risks associated with fault currents.

epistemic_metadata.source: PDF IEEE Recommended Practice for System Grounding of Industrial and ...; Grounding Practices in Power Distribution Systems
